description:
Even though it`s Christmas, Sergeant Keroro and his platoon are facing a crisis: a research commission from Keron is coming to Pekopon at midnight to see some results of the invasion... and if the commission isn`t satisfied, the alien frogs are to be shipped back home! Keroro rounds up the troops and they finally come up with a plan to fool their visitors into thinking an invasion has taken place, but will they have time to implement the ambitious project?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je n`ose pas te souhaiter un joyeux Noël
Keroro, I Cannot Say Merry Christmas
ケロロ メリークリスマスが言えなくて であります
